vote.title: To amend Ordinance No. 1826-2023, passed by Columbus City Council on July 17, 2023, to allow for a decrease in the amount of funds granted in the amount of $50,000.00. ($50,000.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND This legislation authorizes an amendment to Ordinance No. 1826-2023, passed by Columbus City Council on July 17, 2023, to allow for a correction of the funds granted to Dress for Success Columbus, by decreasing the total amount by $50,000.00.  This reduction will make the total awarded be an amount up to $100,000.00
 
Ordinance No. 1826-2023, authorized the Director of the Department of Development to enter into a Grant Agreement with Dress for Success Columbus for Year 2 of the department’s Elevate 1.0 program to support and increase the organizational capacity of the non-profit organizations that experienced revenue loss caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.
 
It was recently discovered that, due to a clerical error that Dress for Success Columbus was awarded an incorrect amount up to $150,000.00.  The total of the grant amount should have been only up to $100,000.00 (a decrease of $50,000).  
 
All other aspects of Ordinance No. 1826-2023 remains the same.
 
FISCAL IMPACT: $50,000.00 will be reduced from Ordinance No. 1826-2023 and made available for other grant opportunities within the budget.
 
CONTRACT COMPLIANCE: The vendor number is 001406 and the contract compliance date is 11/07/2024. 
 
 
Title
 
To amend Ordinance No. 1826-2023, passed by Columbus City Council on July 17, 2023, to allow for a decrease in the amount of funds granted in the amount of $50,000.00. ($50,000.00)
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the Director of the Department of Development was authorized to enter into a Grant Agreement with Dress for Success Columbus for Year 2 of the department’s Elevate 1.0 program;
 
WHEREAS, a clerical error was made in the amount assigned to Dress for Success Columbus, as well as 11 other agencies grant amounts in Ordinance No. 1825-2023;
 
WHEREAS, the Director of the Department of Development requests that Ordinance No. 1826-2023 be amended to allow for a correction of the amount of funds granted to Dress for Success Columbus by decreasing the total grant amount by $50,000.00; NOW THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1. That Ordinance No. 1826-2023, passed by Columbus City Council on July 17, 2023, be amended to allow for a correction of the funds granted to Dress for Success Columbus, decreasing the total amount granted by $50,000.00 making the new grant amount up to $100,000.00 ($50,000.00)
 
SECTION 2.  That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
